title: 820-3115-B No Serial
message:
Have a 2012 Non Retina 13" i7 with no serial number. Dumped the BIOS and the section that usually contains the SSN is missing from the file. Unit's Serial is C1MMG4VFDV30(On RAM Slot).
How do I go about re-adding the serial number?
Link to original Dump included
